name: Tower Princess
description:
Join an endless queue of the knights destined to rescue princesses and princes in a game that evokes the classic 3D action-platformers with puzzles and a roguelite component. You'll have to manage a DATE with a wide variety of royalty members, as you face the dangers of the dungeon.
Once upon a time, in a Far Away Land, an Evil Dragon took prisoner every royal heir he could meet. Lots of worthy suitors of every kingdom tried to face the beast, without success. Now it's your turn! You'll have to do your best to beat the dungeon, defeat the dragon, and manage the most perfect date!
Adventure through an ever-changing castle with 3 procedurally generated areas;
Challenge the inhabitants of the castle making use of the randomized qualities of your knight
Before your “Happily Ever After”, you’ll need to win the heart of a princess or a prince! Take them out on a perfect DATE and face the Evil Dragon together with your better half!
Make good use of your predecessors’ mistakes with an upgrade system, utilizing the experience you gained with previous adventurers!
Enjoy an amazing visual style that maintains the spirit of classic dungeoneering, transformed into a jolly cartoon parody!
